729803f-a.text:
561-563 Van Duser Street, east side, at St. Pauls Avenue. This old brick house was owned by J. Oneill in 1874 and by Chas. Rosenberg from 1907 to 1917. Dates refer to
maps on which the owners' names appear.
July 8, 1932
P. L. Sperr
